metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3994 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: ELOG 3.1.4-57bea22 and below is affected by a denial of service vulnerability due to a use after free. A remote unauthenticated attacker can crash the ELOG server by sending multiple HTTP POST requests which causes the ELOG function retrieve_url() to use a freed variable.

criterions.comment: elog package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
